vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.15;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
§ Tema = "desert"
n pr m
1) the 9th son of Ishmael
n pr loc
2) the land settled by Tema the son of Ishmael
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
堤瑪 这个字在原文的意思是 "沙漠"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 以實瑪利的第九個兒子
地名專有名詞
2) 以實馬利的兒子堤瑪所定居的地方
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
堤玛 这个字在原文的意思是 "沙漠"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 以实玛利的第九个儿子
地名专有名词
2) 以实马利的儿子堤玛所定居的地方

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Tema = "desert"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the 9th son of Ishmael
n pr loc
2) the land settled by Tema the son of Ishmael
